long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Gta Craft is a fun and free game right on the chrome extension with simple and attractive gameplay. By pressing the space bar to start the game, then continuously moving to avoid shooting tanks, the longer you move, the farther you get, thereby gaining a high score. Every time a tank shoots a wall, you will gain points and if a tank hits a car, you will lose points. When all the points you have are deducted, you will lose.
